title: HUD UPGRADE will I be banned?
body: I want to upgrade my HUD like the streamers do. I have the files I know where to put them and I know how to make it work... But I am scared to do this because the T&C says modding is bannable... But is that only for modding the game play and not the layout of the screen? I want someone from Riot to answer because I heard that streamers have overlays and they dont actaully add anything the files of the LOL.client.

replies.body:
Hey there,

What you have said is correct, most streamers do not modify their games files and are merely overlaying an image onto their video using their streaming suite of choice.

As with any modifications made to the game, while these may not be currently punished for this can change at any point in time as ANY AND ALL modifications to any game files are disallowed.
